frame.name: Being_up_to_it
frame.definition:
<def-root> An <fen>Entity</fen> meets the pre-conditions for participating in an <fen>Activity</fen> that is judged to be difficult for it to participate in, either due to inherent properties of the <fen>Entity</fen> or temporary <fen>Circumstances</fen>. A <fen>Degree</fen> modifier may indicate by how much the <fen>Entity</fen> exceeds or falls short of the minimum requirements.
</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> whose meeting or falling short of pre-conditions is assessed.
<ex><fex name="Entity">Little Tommy</fex> was not <t>up</t> <t>to</t> getting out of bed.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Entity</fen> may participate in.
<ex>He was a very meek and shy person, and always felt that he was not <t>equal</t> <fex name="act">to the task set before him</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Entity</fen> exceeds or falls short of the minimum requirements for participating in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Blind parents are <fex name="Deg">very much</fex> <t>up</t> <t>to</t> driving their kids to soccer practice.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Entity</fen> meets or fails to meet the pre-conditions.
<ex>Bill was not equal to the task <fex name="cir">with the distraction of the alien landing</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>An entity, event, or state that causes the <fen>Entity</fen> to meet or fail to meet the pre-conditions for participating in an <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cause">Because of his mother's death</fex>, Smithers was not <t>up</t> <t>to</t> taking the final exam.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relevant_feature
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characteristic or behavior of the <fen>Entity</fen> that is considered when judging whether the <fen>Entity</fen> might participate in the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>The robot is <t>up</t> <t>to</t> the task <fex name="rel">in intelligence</fex> but completely socially inept.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: sufficient.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: qualified or competent to deal with a challenge

lexUnit.name: up to.prep
lexUnit.definition: FN: capable of undertaking a specified difficult activity

lexUnit.name: equal.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having the ability or resources to meet a challenge
